content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>NOAA/NESDIS/NODC/NCDDC-National Coastal Data Development Center</origin> <pubdate>Unpublished material</pubdate> <title>24-Hour Forecast of Air Temperatures from the National Weather Service's National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD)</title> <geoform>map</geoform> <onlink>http://www.ncddc.noaa.gov/arcgis/rest/services/Models/NWS_AirTempForecasts/MapServer</onlink> <onlink>http://www.ncddc.noaa.gov/interactive-maps/environmental-monitoring/habsos/</onlink> <onlink>http://service.ncddc.noaa.gov/website/AGSViewers/HABSOS/maps.htm</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>The National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD) contains a seamless mosaic of the National Weather Service's (NWS) digital forecasts of air temperature.  In collaboration with NWS National Centers for Environmental Prediction (NCEP) and NWS Weather Forecast Offices (WFO), the central NDFD server ingests 5-km, 2-dimensional grids of air temperature, and  creates experimental forecast data mosaics for the coterminous United States (CONUS), Alaska, Hawaii, and Guam.</abstract> <purpose>The National Coastal Data Development Center (NCDDC) accesses this database once daily to get the 24hr forecast for air temperatures.  This information is being made available in the near realtime application of the Harmful Algal Blooms Observing System as an environmental data layer that may affect the spread of these blooms.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>Unknown</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>forecast based on source data time period</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>Daily</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-130.142456</westbc> <eastbc>-60.846630</eastbc> <northbc>52.827621</northbc> <southbc>20.165239</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>air temperature</themekey> <themekey>weather</themekey> <themekey>forecast</themekey> </theme> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Category</themekt> <themekey>climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>None</placekt> <placekey>United States</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None</accconst> <useconst>The information available from this forecast model is experimental in nature and should be used with caution.</useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>NOAA/NESDIS/NODC/NCDDC-National Coastal Data Development Center</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical</addrtype> <address>1021 Balch Blvd., Suite 1003</address> <city>Stennis Space Center</city> <state>MS</state> <postal>39529</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>866-732-2382</cntvoice> <cntfax>228-688-2968</cntfax> <cntemail>ncddcmetadata@noaa.gov</cntemail> <hours>Monday - Friday, 8am - 5pm, Central Standard Time</hours> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <browse> <browsen>http://www.ncddc.noaa.gov/approved_recs/ncddc_ims/gis/ims/final/NWS_AirTemperatures_24hr_browse_nws_atmp.jpg</browsen> <browsed>Air temperature forecast for United States</browsed> <browset>JPEG</browset> </browse> <datacred>National Weather Service</datacred> <progaff> <progname>National Coastal Data Development Center IMS Services</progname> </progaff> </idinfo> <dataqual> <logic>Unknown</logic> <complete>Complete</complete> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srccite> <citeinfo> <origin>National Weather Service</origin> <pubdate>Unpublished material</pubdate> <title>National Digital Forecast Database</title> <geoform>tabular digital data</geoform> <onlink>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/ndfd/</onlink> </citeinfo> </srccite> <typesrc>online</typesrc> <srctime> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>Unknown</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <srccurr>ground condition</srccurr> </srctime> <srccitea>NWS_data</srccitea> <srccontr>Responsible for maintaining the database with most current information</srccontr> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>The National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD) ftp server is accessed once daily by the National Coastal Data Development Center.  Air temperature forecasts for the United States are downloaded from this server.  Data from the NDFD are provided in GRIB, Edition 2 (WMO 2001) format.  The National Weather Service provides decoding software that will convert data into ESRI shapefile format.  This decoding program is run at the National Coastal Data Development Center (NCDDC).  This software has been slightly modified by the National Coastal Data Development Center in order to capture the date of the forecast as a field within the generated shapefile.  The resulting shapefiles are loaded as ArcSDE layers and stored at NCDDC.</procdesc> <srcused>NWS_data</srcused> <procdate>Unknown</procdate> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>NOAA/NESDIS/NODC/NCDDC-National Coastal Data Development Center</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical</addrtype> <address>1021 Balch Blvd., Suite 1003</address> <city>Stennis Space Center</city> <state>MS</state> <postal>39529</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>866-732-2382</cntvoice> <cntfax>228-688-2968</cntfax> <cntemail>ncddcmetadata@noaa.gov</cntemail> <hours>Monday - Friday, 8am - 5pm, Central Standard Time</hours> </cntinfo> </proccont> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <direct>Vector</direct> <ptvctinf> <sdtsterm> <sdtstype>G-polygon</sdtstype> </sdtsterm> </ptvctinf> </spdoinfo> <eainfo> <detailed> <enttyp> <enttypl>HABSOS.atmp_d100</enttypl> <enttypd>ArcSDE attribute table for 24-hour air temperature forecast from the National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD).  The time of the forecast is 0000z.</enttypd> <enttypds>NOAA/NESDIS/NODC/NCDDC-National Coastal Data Development Center</enttypds> </enttyp> <attr> <attrlabl>FID</attrlabl> <attrdef>Internal feature number</attrdef> <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs> <attrdomv> <udom>Sequential unique whole number automatically generated</udom> </attrdomv> </attr> <attr> <attrlabl>Shape</attrlabl> <attrdef>Feature geometry</attrdef> <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs> <attrdomv> <udom>Coordinates representing feature geometry</udom> </attrdomv> </attr> <attr> <attrlabl>T</attrlabl> <attrdef>Air temperature 24 hour forecast value.  Note: A value of 9999 represents a null entry into the database.</attrdef> <attrdefs>NOAA/NESDIS/NODC/NCDDC-National Coastal Data Development Center</attrdefs> <attrdomv> <rdom> <rdommin>-20</rdommin> <rdommax>9999</rdommax> <attrunit>Fahrenheit</attrunit> <attrmres>0.001</attrmres> </rdom> </attrdomv> </attr> <attr> <attrlabl>VDATE</attrlabl> <attrdef>calendar date of the forecast</attrdef> <attrdefs>NOAA/NESDIS/NODC/NCDDC-National Coastal Data Development Center</attrdefs> <attrdomv> <udom>Free text in the following format: yyyy/mm/dd-hh.  The yyyy is the year, mm is the month, dd is the day, and hh is the hour.  All dates are in GMT.</udom> </attrdomv> </attr> </detailed> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>NOAA/NESDIS/NODC/NCDDC-National Coastal Data Development Center</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical</addrtype> <address>1021 Balch Blvd., Suite 1003</address> <city>Stennis Space Center</city> <state>MS</state> <postal>39529</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>866-732-2382</cntvoice> <cntfax>228-688-2968</cntfax> <cntemail>ncddcmetadata@noaa.gov</cntemail> <hours>Monday - Friday, 8am - 5pm, Central Standard Time</hours> </cntinfo> </distrib> <distliab>NOAA makes no warranty regarding these data, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty. NOAA, NESDIS, NODC and NCDDC cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in these data, nor as a result of the failure of these data to function on a particular system.</distliab> <stdorder> <digform> <digtinfo> <formname>ArcGIS REST Services Map Server</formname> <formvern>10.2</formvern> </digtinfo> <digtopt> <onlinopt> <computer> <networka> <networkr>http://www.ncddc.noaa.gov/arcgis/rest/services/Models/NWS_AirTempForecasts/MapServer</networkr> </networka> </computer> <accinstr>Several view and operations, such as Export Map, Identify, Find, Return Updates and Generate KML, are supported from the Map Server URL</accinstr> </onlinopt> </digtopt> </digform> <fees>None</fees> </stdorder> <custom>The National Weather Service's National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD) datasets displayed in this online map can be accessed from the National Weather Service National Digital Forecast Database at this URL,  the National Weather Service's National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD) from the Access Data URL, here; http://www.nws.noaa.gov/ndfd/technical.htm</custom> <techpreq>Please Note: You must enable JavaScript and disable pop-up blocking for the map to function properly.</techpreq> </distinfo> <metainfo> <metd>20141008</metd> <metfrd>20151008</metfrd> <metc> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>NOAA/NESDIS/NODC/NCDDC-National Coastal Data Development Center</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical</addrtype> <address>1021 Balch Blvd., Suite 1003</address> <city>Stennis Space Center</city> <state>MS</state> <postal>39529</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>866-732-2382</cntvoice> <cntfax>228-688-2968</cntfax> <cntemail>ncddcmetadata@noaa.gov</cntemail> <hours>Monday - Friday, 8am - 5pm, Central Standard Time</hours> </cntinfo> </metc> <metstdn>FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn> <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv> <metac>none</metac> <metuc>none</metuc> <metsi> <metscs>none</metscs> <metsc>Unclassified</metsc> <metshd>none</metshd> </metsi> <metextns> <onlink>http://www.ncddc.noaa.gov/metadata-standards/documents/ncddcmdprofile_v2.pdf</onlink> <metprof>Content Specification for Metadata in the National Coastal Data Development Center's Data Catalog Version 2.0</metprof> </metextns> </metainfo> </metadata>
